review: OMG!! So in-love!! This thing was so user friendly and idiot proof. We have a prime account and have been streaming (probably too much) like crazy. We also started a trial Netflix account and have been able to see what Prime did not have available. The only saving grace is that the weather has been horrible and we have been down with colds and bronchitis. So we are not feeling too guilty by all of our couch time. I'm thinking we will get another for the other rooms. Thank you Amazon!! You ROCK!!!
author: M. Mulvey

review: This is definitely as advertised, except for the fact, like others have said, you have to use the power cord enclosed.  I did notice that I was able to get more prime movies by going through my Kindle Fire tablet and putting them on my watchlist.  I don't know if there are so many categories on the stick that I miss many of them or what.  But anyway, once I figured that out, I just love it!  I would highly recommend this product - very user friendly.
